translation.en: I'm guessing it's the relay or the spark plugs.
translation.es: ESTADO DE WASHINGTON HACE 20 AÑOS Me da que es la bujía o el carburador.

translation.en: I got tools back at the cabin.
- Shouldn't be a big job. - Can I help?
Dad?
Yeah. Yeah, sure you can help.
- Is there a safe? At the cabin. - Why?
You got valuables you trying to hide?
- No. - Worried I'm gonna steal
translation.es: - ¿Tienes algo valioso que esconder? - No. ¿Te preocupa que te robe los cromos de béisbol?

translation.en: - your baseball cards? - No.
translation.es: ¿Te preocupa que te robe los cromos de béisbol? No.

translation.en: I heard you on the phone the other night. You said you were at a safe house.
translation.es: Te oí al teléfono la otra noche. Hablabas de una casa segura.

translation.en: It's just another word for cabin.
- So, there's no safe? - There's a fireplace, though.
translation.es: Entonces ¿no hay seguridad? Pero hay chimenea.

translation.en: Maybe we can roast some marshmallows.
translation.es: Podríamos poner al fuego unas nubes de azúcar.

translation.en: Hey. Hey. Hey.
Hey. We need to leave.
- Right now. Come on. - Dad?
Dad, what's happening?
Do not move, no matter what happens.
translation.es: Ni se te ocurra moverte pase lo que pase.

translation.en: You were almost hard to find.
Let's have it.
All of it.
Let's go in.
Here is how I make decisions.
translation.es: Así es como tomo yo las decisiones.

translation.en: Win, you live.
Lose, you die.
Now that's too bad.
Snake eyes. What can I say? House always wins.
translation.es: Snake eyes. ¿Qué puedo decir? La banca siempre gana.

translation.en: No!
- Run! -
- Kid's gone. -
- - And the winner…
Snake Eyes!
They call you Snake Eyes and yet you always win.
translation.es: Te llaman Snake Eyes y, sin embargo, siempre ganas.

translation.en: Of course, your technique is a bit crude, but that has its advantages.
translation.es: Sí, tu técnica es un poco vulgar, pero tiene sus ventajas.

translation.en: I've been watching you for a while now.
That ain't creepy at all.
When you grow up on the streets, it's them or you, right?
translation.es: Cuando te crías en la calle, es o ellos o tú, ¿verdad?

translation.en: My name is Kenta Takamura, and I could use a man like you.
translation.es: Me llamo Kenta Takamura y me vendría bien un hombre como tú.

translation.en: Ain't nothing personal, but I don't work for guys like you.
translation.es: No es nada personal, pero no trabajo para tipos como tú.

translation.en: Or anyone, for that matter.
I know. You are a drifter.
You fight until no one will bet against you anymore,
translation.es: Luchas hasta que ya nadie apuesta contra ti y luego te vas.

translation.en: - and then move on. - Well, works for me.
translation.es: Luchas hasta que ya nadie apuesta contra ti y luego te vas. A mí me vale.

translation.en: They said you watched your old man get killed when you were just a boy.
translation.es: Cuentan que viste cómo mataban a tu padre cuando eras un niño.

translation.en: True?
I like to know who I'm hiring.
translation.es: Me gusta saber a quién contrato.

translation.en: I told you, I ain't interested. You got the wrong guy.
translation.es: Ya te lo he dicho, no me interesa. Te equivocas de hombre.

translation.en: - You haven't heard my offer yet. - I don't care.
translation.es: - Aún no has oído mi oferta. - Me da igual.

translation.en: Homicide victim recovered from cabin fire is still unidentified.
translation.es: La víctima recuperada de la cabaña incendiada sigue sin ser identificada.

translation.en: My men found it going through your motel room.
translation.es: Mis hombres lo han encontrado en tu motel.

translation.en: It sounds like the police could never ID the body.
translation.es: Parece que la policía nunca pudo identificar el cuerpo.

translation.en: Nor did they ever find the killer.
That, Mr. Snake Eyes, is my offer.
translation.es: Esa, Snake Eyes, es mi oferta.

translation.en: I'm pretty good at finding people. Especially people who kill other people.
translation.es: Se me da muy bien encontrar a personas, sobre todo, personas que matan a otras.

translation.en: Come work for me,
and I promise you, I'll find the man who did this.
translation.es: y te prometo que encontraré al hombre que hizo eso.

translation.en: I'll find a spot for you in my crew.
translation.es: Te buscaré un hueco en mi equipo.

translation.en: You can start at the docks.
Hey.
Uh- oh.
Here comes Fish Boy.
- Cover up! Cover up! Cover up! - Let me know when you get a new joke.
translation.es: ¡Tapaos la nariz! ¡Tapaos la nariz! Te repites demasiado.

translation.en: - Hey. Easy, easy. - Huh? They're just kids.
Throw it over. Yeah.
I'm guessing you were always picked last in the playground, huh?
translation.es: Apuesto a que te escogían el último en el patio del cole.

translation.en: - - Hey! No, no, no! Huh?
Take it easy. Hmm?
He meant no disrespect.
- Right? - Yeah. Sure.
I don't know what your deal is, but you have guts.
translation.es: No sé de qué vas, pero qué huevos tienes.

translation.en: Boss.
Hey!
Fish Boy.
What's goin' on?
Boss wants to talk to you.
Am I in trouble?
Someone is.
Leave the knife. Hmm?
We operate on one currency.
Not money. Not fear. Just one simple thing.
translation.es: No es dinero, no es miedo, solo una cosa muy sencilla.

translation.en: Trust.
See, 'cause without trust, there can be no loyalty.
translation.es: Porque, sin confianza, no puede haber lealtad.

translation.en: And without loyalty…
there is no Yakuza.
Tommy- san.
You look surprised to see me.
Kenta.
I wouldn't have pictured you in a place like this with friends like these.
translation.es: No te imaginaba en un sitio como este con amigos como estos.

translation.en: My cousin here is one of Japan's most powerful sons.
translation.es: Mi primo es uno de los herederos más poderosos de Japón.

translation.en: - And you are one of its most disgraced. - This man betrayed our trust.
translation.es: Y tú eres uno de los más repudiados. Este hombre ha traicionado nuestra confianza.

translation.en: He's an undercover spy, acting out of loyalty to his precious clan.
translation.es: Es un espía infiltrado que se mantiene leal a su querido clan.

translation.en: Let's show him what loyalty really looks like.
translation.es: Vamos a demostrarle cómo es la lealtad de verdad.

translation.en: This is a mistake.
Everything we want in life comes at a price.
translation.es: Todo lo que queremos en la vida tiene un precio.

translation.en: - Now do it. -
- That's disappointing. - Kenta!
- - Hey.
Mind?
- - Come on. Let's get out of here!
Let's go!
Now can we go?
- This way! -
- No, no, no. - Kenta!
What an angry boy you are.
translation.es: Eres un chico lleno de ira.

translation.en: You always were.
Tommy, get in the truck!
- Anytime you're ready. -
- Come on! - All right, I'm trying!
LAPD. Drop your weapons.
- Don't move. - You all right?
Yeah. Just peachy.
Good.
- You're alive. - Tommy.
You're safe.
We are going home.
I don't have a home.
Not yours. Mine.
translation.es: A la tuya no, a la mía.

translation.en: I owe you a blood debt.
translation.es: Tengo una deuda de sangre contigo.

translation.en: You saved my life. Why?
I'm not a murderer.
I looked into your eyes, and I saw honor.
translation.es: Te miré a los ojos… y vi honor.

translation.en: So, why run guns for the Yakuza?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué traficas con armas para la Yakuza?

translation.en: - It was a mistake. - Well, you got that right.
translation.es: Eso fue un error. En eso tienes razón.

translation.en: If Kenta ever sees you again, you are a dead man.
translation.es: Sabes que, si Kenta vuelve a verte, eres hombre muerto.

translation.en: He called you cousins.
We grew up together.
We were both next in line to become leader of our clan.
translation.es: Éramos los herederos para ser líderes de nuestro clan.

translation.en: But there can only be one.
So Kenta tried to have me killed.
When his treachery was discovered…
I was given the responsibility to decide his fate.
translation.es: se me dio la responsabilidad de decidir su destino.

translation.en: I ordered him banished.
And since then,
he has been trying to seize power the only way he knows how.
translation.es: ha estado intentando hacerse con el poder por el único medio que conoce:

translation.en: Through greed and violence.
I didn't know till today it was Kenta smuggling these guns to Japan.
translation.es: Hoy he sabido que Kenta dirigía el contrabando de armas a Japón.

translation.en: I was ambushed. You're his enemy now too.
translation.es: Esto era una trampa. Ahora tú también eres su enemigo.

translation.en: Which means your Fish Boy life in LA…
translation.es: Lo que significa que tu vida de pescadero en Los Ángeles

translation.en: is over.
There's no going back.
Hey, where are we heading?
Really?
What is it exactly you do?
A little of this, little of that.
translation.es: Cositas por aquí, cositas por allá…

translation.en: - That your wife? - No.
- Your girlfriend. - Uh- uh.
Sister? Akiko is our chief of security.
translation.es: - ¿Hermana? - Akiko es nuestra jefa de seguridad.

translation.en: We value her advice, but we don't have to take it.
translation.es: Valoramos su consejo, pero no tenemos por qué seguirlo.

translation.en: The leader of our clan rarely meets outsiders.
translation.es: La líder de nuestro clan rara vez recibe visitantes.

translation.en: Don't forget to bow.
Snake Eyes,
I present the leader of the Clan Arashikage, Sen.
translation.es: te presento a la líder del clan Arashikage: Sen.

translation.en: My grandmother.
The man who saved my grandson's life.
translation.es: El hombre que salvó la vida de mi nieto.

translation.en: We Arashikage are in your debt, which means Japan is in your debt.
translation.es: Los Arashikage estamos en deuda contigo. Lo que significa que todo Japón lo está.

translation.en: Don't worry about it.
I'll settle for a hot bath and a plane ticket out of here.
translation.es: Me basta con un baño caliente y un billete de avión.

translation.en: I have a better idea.
Stay.
I want you to join us.
Join the Arashikage.
Sen- sama. If I may.
Even allowing him this much access is reckless.
translation.es: Concederle este acceso ya es una imprudencia.

translation.en: I vouch for him.
translation.es: - Yo respondo por él. - Con respeto, Tommy-san,

translation.en: With respect, Tommy- san, you do not lead this clan.
translation.es: - Yo respondo por él. - Con respeto, Tommy-san, no eres el líder de este clan…

translation.en: - Not yet. - Someday I will.
translation.es: todavía. Pero algún día lo seré.

translation.en: And I will need a warrior like this by my side.
translation.es: Y necesitaré un guerrero como él a mi lado.

translation.en: Someone I can trust with my life.
translation.es: Alguien a quien pueda confiarle mi vida.

translation.en: For 600 years,
our ninja have brought peace and stability to Japan.
translation.es: nuestros ninjas han traído paz y estabilidad a Japón.

translation.en: The secret blade and iron wall of every government since the age of Edo.
translation.es: Somos la espada secreta, el muro de hierro de los gobiernos desde el periodo Edo.

translation.en: But things have changed.
New threats call for new strategies, even welcoming outsiders.
translation.es: Las nuevas amenazas requieren nuevas estrategias. Incluso acoger a gente de fuera.

translation.en: As you, of all of us, should know, Akiko.
translation.es: Y tú, más que nadie, deberías saberlo, Akiko.

translation.en: Any questions we have about our new friend…
translation.es: Cualquier duda que tengamos sobre nuestro amigo,

translation.en: the Three Challenges of the Warrior will answer them.
translation.es: los Tres Retos del Guerrero la resolverán.

translation.en: And will he submit to the challenges?
translation.es: ¿Y se someterá a los Tres Retos?

translation.en: He will.
I'm sorry, the Three Challenges of the what now?
The Three Challenges are designed to reveal an applicant's character.
translation.es: Los Tres Retos están diseñados para desvelar el carácter del aspirante.

translation.en: The first two will cleanse you of ego, anger, and fear,
translation.es: Los dos primeros te despojarán de tu ego, tu ira y tu miedo,

translation.en: and ready you for the third.
translation.es: y te prepararán para el tercero.

translation.en: That's the true test.
It will be up to you whether you wish to take it.
translation.es: Será decisión tuya si lo aceptas o no.

translation.en: What if I fail?
You die.
You're being serious.
I wouldn't put you in that position if I thought it was likely.
translation.es: Nunca te pondría en esa situación si lo creyera posible.

translation.en: I can't give you a name or a past…
translation.es: No puedo darte un nombre ni un pasado,

translation.en: but I can offer you a purpose.
And something more important.
A home.
And why would you do that?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué ibas a hacer eso?

translation.en: Because I saw honor in your eyes too.
translation.es: Porque yo también vi honor en tus ojos.

translation.en: Come.
Get some rest. You have time to decide.
In the meantime, consider my home your home.
translation.es: Mientras tanto, piensa que mi hogar es el tuyo.

translation.en: So, your toys, my toys, huh?
How American.
You'll need to get farther faster.
translation.es: Tienes que llegar más lejos, más rápido.

translation.en: We don't have much time.
The Arashikage are more than just brute force.
translation.es: Los Arashikage son algo más que fuerza bruta.

translation.en: We are spies, scouts, guardians, infiltrators.
You will be tested, you will be hurt, you will suffer, and you will fail.
translation.es: Te pondrán a prueba, te harán daño, sufrirás y fracasarás.

translation.en: But the hardest part will be listening to you complain about it.
translation.es: Pero lo más duro será oír cómo te quejas.

translation.en: I still think this is a mistake.
Zero hits on his fingerprints.
translation.es: No encuentro nada con sus huellas,

translation.en: Nothing on any of our facial recognition platforms.
translation.es: nada en nuestras plataformas de reconocimiento facial.

translation.en: This stray dog of yours is a ghost.
translation.es: Este perro callejero tuyo es un fantasma.

translation.en: - I'm not scared of ghosts. - I'm serious, Tommy.
translation.es: - Los fantasmas no me dan miedo. - Va en serio, Tommy.

translation.en: He was working for the Yakuza, for God's sake.
- He's not one of them. - That doesn't make him one of us.
translation.es: - No es uno de ellos. - Tampoco es uno de nosotros.

translation.en: Us?
My name…
my name is Tomisaburo Arashikage.
You think I would endanger this clan?
translation.es: ¿Crees que yo pondría en peligro a este clan?

translation.en: I am this clan.
Tommy- san, I wasn't questioning your loyalty.
translation.es: Tommy-san, no estaba poniendo en duda tu lealtad.

translation.en: Just my judgment.
He saved my life, Akiko.
- I owe him this chance. - I understand it.
translation.es: Le debo esta oportunidad. Lo entiendo.

translation.en: I'm just worried you're moving too fast.
translation.es: Pero me preocupa que vayas demasiado deprisa.

translation.en: Too quick to anger, too quick to react. Now you sound like Grandmother.
translation.es: Te enfadas muy rápido, reaccionas muy rápido. Hablas como mi abuela.

translation.en: If I'm wrong about him, we'll find out tomorrow.
translation.es: Si estoy equivocado, lo sabremos mañana.

translation.en: Eighty percent of candidates fail the first challenge.
translation.es: El 80 % de los candidatos no superan el primer reto.

translation.en: - Just saying. - Well,
translation.es: Que lo sepas. Eso significa que el 20 % sí lo supera, Akiko.

translation.en: that means 20% pass, Akiko.
translation.es: Eso significa que el 20 % sí lo supera, Akiko.

translation.en: Just saying.
For 600 years,
our fighters have been trained
by the greatest warriors the world has ever known.
translation.es: por los mejores guerreros que el mundo haya conocido jamás.

translation.en: Hard Master.
And most honorable
Blind Master.
From them, you will learn how to fight,
how to kill when necessary, but most importantly,
translation.es: cómo matar cuando es necesario, pero, lo más importante,

translation.en: how to live according to the Arashikage Mindset.
translation.es: cómo vivir según dicta el código Arashikage.

translation.en: Abandon ego.
Strike with honor.
Selflessness and truthfulness will lead to harmony.
translation.es: La generosidad y la sinceridad te llevarán a la armonía.

translation.en: Any questions?
- What happens-- - Silence!
You are nothing. This challenge is a waste of time.
translation.es: No eres nada. Este reto es una pérdida de tiempo.

translation.en: You will fail.
Okay, Hard- on Master, or whatever your name is.
translation.es: Muy bien, maestro Durito o como te llames,

translation.en: Let's go.
Challenge one.
Take this bowl from me. I'll take that bowl from you.
translation.es: tú me quitas mi cuenco y yo te quito el tuyo.

translation.en: Okay, I'll bite.
What's the punch line?
You must take my bowl without spilling any water.
translation.es: Tienes que quitarme el cuenco sin derramar el agua.

translation.en: Fail four times and your training is over before it begins.
translation.es: Si fallas cuatro veces, tu adiestramiento habrá terminado antes de empezar.

translation.en: - - That's one.
Two.
- - That's three.
This is embarrassing.
He has a lot to learn.
Abandon ego.
Selflessness and truthfulness…
will lead to harmony.
Hard Master.
I humbly request that you accept my bowl in exchange for yours.
translation.es: humildemente, te pido que aceptes este cuenco a cambio del tuyo.

translation.en: No congratulations?
- One down, two to go. - Congratulations.
translation.es: Ya solo me faltan dos. Enhorabuena.

translation.en: If I ever need a bowl of water, I know who to ask.
translation.es: Si alguna vez necesito un cuenco de agua, ya sé a quién pedírselo.

translation.en: You hide it well, but I can tell you're a little impressed with me.
translation.es: Lo ocultas bien, pero… te lo noto. Estás un poco impresionada.

translation.en: What I think of you is irrelevant.
translation.es: Lo que yo piense de ti es irrelevante.

translation.en: You'll survive the third test, or you won't.
translation.es: Sobrevivirás a la tercera prueba o no.

translation.en: Then it won't matter at all.
To Tommy, our future toryo.
May you be strong, wise, and honorable.
translation.es: Que seas fuerte, sabio y honorable.

translation.en: To Snake Eyes. May you die well.
translation.es: Por Snake Eyes. Que mueras bien.

translation.en: - Kanpai. - Kanpai!
That word he used, toryo.
translation.es: Esa palabra que ha usado, toryo…

translation.en: It means, head of family.
I am the last of the Arashikage bloodline.
translation.es: Soy el último con sangre Arashikage.

translation.en: Ever since I was a child, I've been groomed to lead.
translation.es: Desde que era un niño, me han preparado para ser líder.

translation.en: This is my destiny.
But…  …if I'm to lead the clan into the next hundred years,
translation.es: Pero, si quiero guiar al clan en los próximos cien años,

translation.en: I have to adapt.
We have to adapt.
I need warriors like you,
who have lived in and know the new world but can master the Arashikage mindset
translation.es: que conocen el nuevo mundo pero que puedan aprender el código Arashikage

translation.en: to become the future of the clan and fight side by side,
translation.es: para convertirse en el futuro del clan y luchar hombro con hombro como hermanos.

translation.en: as brothers.
translation.es: y luchar hombro con hombro como hermanos.

translation.en: Anyway… eat.
Why is Hard Master staring at me like that?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me mira así el maestro Duro?

translation.en: He isn't.
He is very nearsighted.
The Blind Master, on the other hand…
well, he is watching you.
They say he knows a liar when he hears one.
translation.es: Distingue a los mentirosos solo con oírlos.

translation.en: Hey, Tommy said I could borrow one of his bikes.
translation.es: Tommy dice que puedo coger una de sus motos.

translation.en: His motorbikes?
- Bike…  - Yes.
That one.
Keep an eye on the bike.
I didn't know if you would show up.
Why?
Just because you left me to bleed out on a dock in LA?
translation.es: ¿Porque me dejaste medio desangrado en un muelle de Los Ángeles?

translation.en: All you had to do was get Tommy on that boat.
translation.es: Solo tenías que hacer que Tommy subiera a ese barco.

translation.en: You think you could've mentioned that he'd wade through 50 Yakuza
translation.es: Podías haber mencionado que se abriría paso entre 50 yakuzas

translation.en: just for the chance to kick your ass?
translation.es: solo para poder partirte la cara.

translation.en: Hey, it worked.
You earned his trust. You got in.
translation.es: Te has ganado su confianza. Estás dentro.

translation.en: By the way, how did he like,
translation.es: Por cierto, ¿qué le pareció lo de…

translation.en: I looked into your eyes and saw honor?
translation.es: te miré a los ojos y vi honor?

translation.en: - He ate it up. - I knew he would.
He told me about your history.
How you tried to kill him and he cast you out of the clan.
translation.es: cómo intentaste matarlo y cómo él te echó del clan.

translation.en: Our family drama is not your concern.
translation.es: Nuestros dramas familiares no son asunto tuyo.

translation.en: Yeah, you're right about that, 'cause I'm out.
translation.es: Nada es asunto mío, porque lo dejo.

translation.en: We had an agreement.
And I seem to be the only guy who's keeping up his end of it.
translation.es: Y parece que yo soy el único que está cumpliendo su parte.

translation.en: And here I had a gift for you.
translation.es: Y yo que tenía un regalo para ti…

translation.en: You found him.
- Where? - Easy now.
I kept my word. Now you have to keep yours.
translation.es: Yo he cumplido mi palabra. Ahora tú cumple la tuya.

translation.en: They want me to take three tests.
I fail the third, I die.
translation.es: Si no supero la tercera, moriré.

translation.en: So, whatever you need me to do, it better be quick.
translation.es: Así que, si quieres que haga algo, que sea rápido.

translation.en: It's up to you.
There is a priceless artifact hidden in the castle grounds.
translation.es: Hay un valioso objeto oculto en alguna parte del castillo.

translation.en: The Jewel of the Sun.
It's a symbol of Arashikage's power.
translation.es: Es un símbolo del poder Arashikage.

translation.en: Find the jewel and bring it to me…
and I'll give you your father's killer.
translation.es: y yo te daré al asesino de tu padre.

translation.en: You're welcome.
This place is built like a fortress. What are you protecting?
translation.es: Tenéis mucha seguridad. ¿Qué es lo que protegéis?

translation.en: When I was young,
I was told stories of the Sun Goddess.
translation.es: me contaban historias de la Diosa del Sol.

translation.en: Once, long ago, she wanted to test the character of her people,
translation.es: Una vez, hace mucho, quiso poner a prueba el carácter de su pueblo,

translation.en: so she sent down a gift in the form of a jewel.
translation.es: así que les envió un regalo en forma de joya.

translation.en: A jewel that contained the power of the sun.
translation.es: Esa joya contenía el poder del sol.

translation.en: We swore an oath to protect it, but more important,
to never use it ourselves.
- As I grew, I realized why. -
translation.es: Según me hice mayor, comprendí por qué.

translation.en: We have the power to destroy anyone who wrongs us,
translation.es: Tenemos el poder de destruir a cualquiera que nos ataque,

translation.en: but that is a dangerous temptation.
translation.es: pero esa es una tentación peligrosa.

translation.en: True power calls for discipline.
This is Morning Light.
translation.es: Esta… es Luz de la Mañana.

translation.en: My gift to you for passing the first challenge.
translation.es: Mi regalo para ti por superar el primer reto.

translation.en: It's easy to shoot with a gun,
but the sword is a weapon of honor.
translation.es: pero la espada es un arma de honor.

translation.en: You know what I mean.
It suits you.
Hey, there was nothing in that brochure about a nuclear jewel.
translation.es: En el folleto no pone nada de una joya nuclear.

translation.en: Only a few have access.
My grandmother, the masters…
and me.
It seems like a lot of protocol for a fairy tale.
translation.es: Mucho protocolo por un cuento de hadas.

translation.en: Not protocol. There's a DNA lock.
translation.es: No es protocolo, es un lector de ADN.

translation.en: Like I said, blood matters to my family.
translation.es: Como te digo, la sangre importa en mi familia.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
You.
I was going for a walk.
Hmm. With a sword?
I thought it was time to get serious about my training.
translation.es: Ya era hora de tomarme en serio mi entrenamiento.

translation.en: That's Morning Light, a weapon of honor.
translation.es: Es Luz de la Mañana, un arma de honor.

translation.en: What makes you think you deserve it? What makes you think you can use it?
translation.es: ¿Qué te hace pensar que la mereces? Y que puedes usarla.

translation.en: How hard could it be?
Let's find out.
- How'd you get that scar? - How did you get your name?
translation.es: - ¿Cómo te hiciste esa cicatriz? - ¿Cómo te pusieron ese nombre?

translation.en: I'll tell you when you get to know me better.
translation.es: Te lo contaré cuando nos conozcamos mejor.

translation.en: If you live that long.
- How about a wager? - I'm all ears.
translation.es: - ¿Qué tal una apuesta? - Soy todo oídos.

translation.en: Land one blow on me and I won't cut them both off.
translation.es: Si consigues ponerme la mano encima, no te corto las orejas.

translation.en: And if I lose?
- You tell me why you're here. - I thought I did.
translation.es: - Me dirás qué haces aquí. - Ya lo he hecho. Entrenar.

translation.en: - We're training. - Here with the Arashikage.
You're on.
With your sword.
- Come at me like you mean it. -
It's not your skill that's lacking, it's your heart.
translation.es: No es habilidad lo que te falta, es corazón.

translation.en: If your heart is pure, our secrets will reveal themselves to you.
translation.es: Si eres puro de corazón, nuestros secretos te serán revelados.

translation.en: If not…
…they'll be your end.
- You gonna get that? -
- A win without honor is no win at all. -
translation.es: Una victoria sin honor no es una victoria.

translation.en: Are you sure it's Kenta?
He found a new way to bring his guns to Japan.
translation.es: Ha encontrado una nueva forma de meter sus armas en Japón.

translation.en: He's taking delivery of a shipment tonight.
If I move fast, I can get the jump on him.
translation.es: Si me muevo rápido, podré pillarle por sorpresa.

translation.en: - You have a location? - Shinjuku.
- I'll send a team. - No.
I'll handle this myself.
You have that look you get sometimes. The shadow before a storm.
translation.es: Tienes esa cara que se te pone a veces. La sombra antes de la tormenta.

translation.en: That storm will pass when I kill Kenta.
translation.es: Esa tormenta pasará cuando mate a Kenta.

translation.en: Tommy.
I'll come with you.
I'll block the alley from the street.
Tommy, you handle the rest of them.
translation.es: Tommy, tú te encargas de los demás.

translation.en: And you, secure the weapons.
translation.es: Y tú, hazte con las armas.

translation.en: - What about Kenta? - He's mine.
They're here.
Who are you?
Boys.
Cobra.
This is a lot of firepower.
What does Kenta want with it all?
To start a war. With us.
translation.es: Para empezar una guerra. Contra nosotros.

translation.en: Which means we're gonna need support. Let's call Scarlett.
translation.es: Lo que significa que necesitamos ayuda. Hay que llamar a Scarlett.

translation.en: - Major O'Hara. - Give me a second.
I need to take care of some surprise guests.
translation.es: Estoy ocupándome de unos viejos amigos.

translation.en: Go ahead.
Kenta is back in Tokyo and aligning with Cobra.
translation.es: Kenta ha vuelto a Tokio y está colaborando con Cobra.

translation.en: - This is recent? - From tonight.
Hang on a sec, okay?
Should we be worried?
- About Scarlett? - No, Major O'Hara is with the Joes.
translation.es: ¿Por Scarlett? No. La mayor O'Hara es de los Joes.

translation.en: - The what? - An elite global counterterrorism unit.
translation.es: ¿Los qué? Una unidad antiterrorista global de élite.

translation.en: They're the good guys.
- Cobra. - So, what's the deal with Cobra?
The deal is, they're a secret network of terrorist cells, crime syndicates,
translation.es: Son una red secreta de células terroristas, mafias,

translation.en: arms manufacturers and paramilitary groups linked under a single centralized command.
translation.es: fabricantes de armas y grupos paramilitares bajo un único mando central.

translation.en: A shadow organization devoted to bringing about global revolution
translation.es: Una organización fantasma empeñada en provocar una revolución global

translation.en: through violence, extortion, and fear.
translation.es: a través de la violencia, la extorsión y el miedo.

translation.en: Major?
Major O'Hara? Major?
I just sent you a mission brief.
translation.es: Acabo de mandarte el informe de la misión.

translation.en: I've been keeping tabs on an old friend of mine
translation.es: He estado siguiendo a una vieja amiga que acaba de aterrizar en Japón.

translation.en: who just landed in Japan. I don't think it's a coincidence.
translation.es: He estado siguiendo a una vieja amiga que acaba de aterrizar en Japón. Y no creo que sea una coincidencia.

translation.en: Her name's Ana DeCobray, aka Baroness.
translation.es: Se llama Ana DeCobray, alias Baronesa.

translation.en: Since we lost touch, she's been busy.
translation.es: Desde que perdimos el contacto, ha estado ocupada.

translation.en: She killed a member of parliament?
Along with 200 other passengers on the same train,
translation.es: Junto con otros 200 pasajeros que iban en el mismo tren

translation.en: just to influence an election.
translation.es: solo para influir en unas elecciones.

translation.en: She's been linked to bombings, assassinations,
translation.es: Se la ha relacionado con atentados, asesinatos y revueltas civiles

translation.en: and civil unrest everywhere from Nanzhao to Barovia.
translation.es: Se la ha relacionado con atentados, asesinatos y revueltas civiles de Nanzhao a Borovia.

translation.en: In short, she's top- echelon Cobra.
translation.es: En resumen, es la mandamás de Cobra.

translation.en: If Kenta's linked up with the Baroness, the threat to you is significant.
translation.es: Si Kenta está trabajando con la Baronesa, vuestra amenaza es muy grave.

translation.en: I'll be in Tokyo as soon as I can.
translation.es: Estaré en Tokio lo antes posible.

translation.en: I didn't sign up to work for terrorists.
A little late to grow a conscience, don't you think?
translation.es: Un poco tarde para tener cargo de conciencia, ¿no crees?

translation.en: We each have our own agenda.
There is no reason this triangle of ours can't be purely transactional.
translation.es: No hay razón para que este triángulo nuestro no sea puramente transaccional.

translation.en: We all have something the other wants.
translation.es: Cada uno tiene algo que el otro quiere.

translation.en: Baroness.
I know who you are and what you've done.
translation.es: Sé quién eres. Sé lo que has hecho.

translation.en: That rock you want me to steal, it's for Cobra, isn't it?
translation.es: Esa piedra que quieres que robe es para Cobra, ¿verdad?

translation.en: No. I didn't sign up for this.
translation.es: No. Este no era el trato.

translation.en: As I said, ours is a series of exchanges.
translation.es: Como he dicho, esto es una serie de intercambios.

translation.en: Kenta wants to destroy the clan.
The clan has something I want.
translation.es: El clan tiene algo que yo quiero. Y nosotros tenemos algo que tú quieres.

translation.en: And we have something you want. Now of course,
translation.es: El clan tiene algo que yo quiero. Y nosotros tenemos algo que tú quieres. Por supuesto, si has cambiado de idea, puedes irte.

translation.en: if you've had a change of heart, you are free to go.
translation.es: Por supuesto, si has cambiado de idea, puedes irte.

translation.en: But then, so is he.
translation.es: Pero entonces… él también se irá.

translation.en: He goes by Augustine.
The man who took your father's life,
translation.es: El hombre que le quitó la vida a tu padre...

translation.en: and yours.
Tell me where he is.
Under lock and key.
But I promise you, back out now and you will never see him again.
translation.es: Pero te prometo que si te echas atrás ahora, no volverás a verlo jamás.

translation.en: All that rage…
for all these years.
Are you sure you're ready to give up the hunt
translation.es: ¿Estás preparado para renunciar a tu presa

translation.en: when you're so close to finding peace?
translation.es: cuando estás tan cerca de alcanzar la paz?

translation.en: Think about it.
You have three days.
Then I let him go.
Trust me. He'll do it.
He'd better. Or I kill you both.
translation.es: Más le vale. O los dos moriréis.

translation.en: Every warrior has a weakness your enemy can exploit.
translation.es: Todo guerrero tiene una debilidad que su enemigo puede aprovechar.

translation.en: The second challenge will expose it.
translation.es: El segundo reto destapará esa debilidad.

translation.en: To avoid harm, you must first learn how you harm yourself.
translation.es: Para evitar el daño, primero debes aprender cómo hacerte daño a ti mismo.

translation.en: Most can't manage and fail.
translation.es: La mayoría no lo consigue y fracasa.

translation.en: Where is everybody else?
This test is private and unique to you.
translation.es: Esta prueba es privada y única para ti.

translation.en: You face it alone.
The light will reveal all.
translation.es: La luz te lo mostrará todo.

translation.en: Follow it.
I'm sorry, Dad.
I couldn't stop him.
It's not your fault. You were just a kid.
translation.es: No es culpa tuya. Eras un niño.

translation.en: I couldn't save you.
You saved yourself.
That's the only thing that mattered to me.
translation.es: Era lo único que me importaba.

translation.en: Did I pass?
This is more than a test you pass or fail. It is a mirror to reveal your weakness.
translation.es: Esto es algo más que una prueba que se supera o no, es un espejo que revela tu debilidad.

translation.en: - - Even if it causes you more pain, you must unburden yourself.
translation.es: Aunque te cause más dolor, debes liberarte de esa carga.

translation.en: It is the only way to overcome the third challenge.
translation.es: Es la única forma de superar el tercer reto.

translation.en: And I assure you, this is not a challenge you want to fail.
translation.es: Y, te lo aseguro, es un reto en el que no conviene fracasar.

translation.en: Motion detectors picked up activity in our weapons research facility.
translation.es: Los sensores detectan actividad en el centro de armas.

translation.en: - Did you make an ID? - He was masked.
How did they get past the walls?
Maybe they didn't.
translation.es: Tal vez no lo han hecho.

translation.en: Did I miss something?
I followed you into the city.
But you know that. Where did you go?
You've been looking for a reason not to trust me from the start.
translation.es: Sigues buscando una razón para desconfiar de mí.

translation.en: You're an unknown. That's dangerous.
translation.es: Eres un desconocido. Eso es peligroso.

translation.en: - I think you can handle yourself. - Dangerous to this clan.
translation.es: - Me da que sabes defenderte. - Peligroso para este clan.

translation.en: You don't know what this place means to me.
translation.es: Tú no sabes lo que significa este sitio para mí.

translation.en: I owe the Arashikage everything.
translation.es: Le debo todo a los Arashikage.

translation.en: I never knew family before I arrived here.
translation.es: No supe lo que era una familia hasta que llegué aquí.

translation.en: Can you understand that?
You wanna know why I've been a ghost for so long?
translation.es: ¿Quieres saber por qué he sido un fantasma tanto tiempo?

translation.en: My father was murdered when I was a kid.
translation.es: Mataron a mi padre cuando yo era niño.

translation.en: When I tried to find out why, it was as if he didn't exist.
translation.es: Cuando quise averiguar por qué, fue como si no hubiese existido.

translation.en: False identities, false papers.
Everything about him was a lie.
Even my own name.
That's why I couldn't find you.
If I pass the third challenge…
I'm Arashikage, right?
If you pass.
I have to pass.
I've done unforgivable things I wish I could tell you, but I can't.
translation.es: He hecho cosas imperdonables que me gustaría contarte, pero no puedo.

translation.en: But if I could become part of this family, be its protector…
translation.es: Si pudiera ser parte de esta familia, ser su protector,

translation.en: I think that would make it right.
Then empty your heart.
Whatever you're hiding in there, the challenge will see right through it.
translation.es: Eso que ocultas, el reto lo descubrirá.

translation.en: I see that you have a clouded mind.
translation.es: Veo que tienes la mente nublada.

translation.en: You live on both sides of the mirror.
translation.es: Vives a ambos lados del espejo.

translation.en: Only you know whether you are ready to take this test.
translation.es: Solo tú sabes si estás preparado para someterte a esta prueba.

translation.en: Be certain that you wish to proceed.
translation.es: Asegúrate de que quieres seguir adelante.

translation.en: Once the third challenge begins, there is no turning back.
translation.es: Una vez que el tercer reto comienza, ya no hay vuelta atrás.

translation.en: I'm sure.
Those who pass are accepted into the Arashikage.
translation.es: Aquellos que lo superan son aceptados en el Arashikage.

translation.en: If you survive,
you will gain access to our knowledge and our power.
translation.es: Si sobrevives, tendrás acceso a nuestro conocimiento y nuestro poder.

translation.en: But…
translation.es: Pero… deberás jurar lealtad a nuestro clan.

translation.en: you must swear loyalty to our clan. Do you accept this condition?
translation.es: Pero… deberás jurar lealtad a nuestro clan. ¿Aceptas esa condición?

translation.en: I do.
What do I do when I get down there?
There is a particular tile.
- Step on it and wait for judgment. -
translation.es: Pisa en el centro y espera el juicio.

translation.en: - Something funny? - You will see…
translation.es: ¿De qué te ríes? Ya lo verás,

translation.en: Snake.
Giant anacondas, as old as time.
They never harm those who are pure of heart.
translation.es: Nunca hacen daño a los puros de corazón.

translation.en: What about everybody else?
Empty your heart.
Go!
Go!
She knows our rules. She will be punished.
translation.es: Conoce las normas. Pagará por esto.

translation.en: - Grandmother-- - You brought him among us.
translation.es: - Abuela… - Tú le has traído a nuestro hogar.

translation.en: The fault is not hers alone.
translation.es: La culpa no es solo de ella.

translation.en: No, Sen- san.
The fault is mine.
Explain yourself.
The penalty of lying is death.
translation.es: Si mientes, pagarás con la muerte.

translation.en: We are all listening.
My heart is not pure.
I seek vengeance.
My father was murdered.
I have dedicated my life to finding the man who did it…
translation.es: He dedicado mi vida a encontrar al hombre que lo hizo

translation.en: and killing him.
This is all I've ever wanted.
translation.es: Esto es lo que siempre he querido.

translation.en: He speaks the truth.
Your honesty wins you your life,
translation.es: Tu sinceridad te da la vida,

translation.en: but not among the Arashikage.
Snake!
You should have told me.
We could have been brothers.
I know I failed you.
You are the only brother I've ever known.
translation.es: Eres el único hermano que he tenido.

translation.en: And I would pay you back with my life if I had to.
translation.es: Y te lo pagaría con mi vida si hiciera falta.

translation.en: Keep it.
It's safe.
I was hoping you wouldn't do that.
Akiko.
You still wanna know how I got my scar?
From the last man I trusted.
translation.es: Del último hombre en quien confié.

translation.en: Trust is a hard thing to come by these days.
translation.es: La confianza es difícil de encontrar.

translation.en: Time for you to learn a lesson.
translation.es: Es hora de aprender la lección.

translation.en: You have placed the clan at risk.
translation.es: Has puesto al clan en peligro.

translation.en: You must atone.
We will return the Jewel…
and bring you the head of Snake Eyes.
translation.es: y traerte la cabeza de Snake Eyes.

translation.en: So?
Do you have it?
You're gonna start a war with the Arashikage, aren't you?
translation.es: Vas a empezar una guerra contra los Arashikage.

translation.en: What do you care?
Remember our deal, and you will get what I promised you.
translation.es: Recuerda nuestro trato y recibirás lo que te prometí.

translation.en: This isn't my fight.
Come here.
Please, enjoy your reward.
translation.es: Por favor, disfruta de tu recompensa.

translation.en: You will get the Jewel once I've destroyed the clan.
translation.es: Tendrás la joya cuando haya destruido el clan.

translation.en: Who are you?
You killed my dad.
You're going to have to be a little more specific.
translation.es: Vas a tener que concretar un poco más.

translation.en: I killed a lot of people.
Roll.
Win, you live.
Lose, you die.
Roll!
Roll!
Snake Eyes.
Okay, okay. All right.
Now I remember you. You attacked me, tried to save your dad.
translation.es: Ya me acuerdo de ti. Me atacaste, intentaste salvar a tu padre.

translation.en: Why did you kill him?
Cobra gives an order, you don't question it.
translation.es: Cuando Cobra te da una orden, no preguntas.

translation.en: - You're Cobra. -
I was.
Until three weeks ago, when that bitch dragged me off a chopper at gunpoint.
translation.es: Hasta hace tres semanas, cuando esa zorra me sacó de un helicóptero con una pistola.

translation.en: You must be a big man for the Baroness to hand me over.
translation.es: Debes de ser muy importante para que la Baronesa te entregue mi cabeza.

translation.en: Let's go. Let's do this.
translation.es: Está bien, acabemos de una vez.

translation.en: I have to stop Kenta.
There he is.
Follow him.
What's he doing?  Looks like he's heading back to the castle.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hace? - Parece que vuelve al castillo.

translation.en: Let's go.
I need backup!
Did you see that? Snake's fighting on our side.
translation.es: ¿Has visto eso? Snake está de nuestro lado.

translation.en: Tommy, listen to me.
Kenta's got the Jewel and is headed for the castle.
translation.es: Kenta tiene la joya y se dirige al castillo.

translation.en: Can you hear me? Tommy! Akiko!
Shit!
We have to keep you safe. Nothing matters but the safety of the clan.
translation.es: - Tenemos que ponerla a salvo. - Solo importa la seguridad del clan.

translation.en: - You are the clan! - I am nothing by myself.
translation.es: ¡Usted es el clan! Yo sola no soy nada.

translation.en: I guess the party started early.
translation.es: Se ve que la fiesta ha empezado pronto.

translation.en: - He needs help. - He deserves to die.
We have to stop Kenta. He has the Jewel.
translation.es: Tenemos que parar a Kenta. Tiene la joya.

translation.en: This isn't over.
- - Leave! Now!
I am the Arashikage.
- This is a terrible idea.  -
You have fought bravely.
I give you my word, your end will be swift and painless.
translation.es: Te doy mi palabra, tu final será rápido e indoloro.

translation.en: Very noble. But the promise is not yours to make.
translation.es: Muy noble, pero no eres quién para hacer esa promesa.

translation.en: The Jewel. The clan is destroyed.
translation.es: La joya. El clan está destruido. Hemos cumplido nuestra parte del trato.

translation.en: We kept our side of the bargain. I trust you'll keep yours.
translation.es: El clan está destruido. Hemos cumplido nuestra parte del trato. Espero que tú cumplas la tuya.

translation.en: With this jewel, Cobra will be invincible.
translation.es: Con esta joya, Cobra será invencible.

translation.en: - Maybe I'll just keep it. -
translation.es: Casi mejor me la quedo yo.

translation.en: No good deed, huh?
Shut up.
Cobra will annihilate you.
You protect my grandmother. I'll go after the Jewel.
translation.es: Vosotros proteged a mi abuela. Yo iré a por la joya.

translation.en: When you cast me out, I warned you
translation.es: Cuando me expulsasteis, os advertí que este día llegaría.

translation.en: this day would come.
translation.es: os advertí que este día llegaría.

translation.en: Kneel.
Very well, then.
Die.
We're under attack! It's Tommy.
Snake.
- You're in a tight spot, huh? - I've been in worse.
translation.es: - Tienes un problema. - Los he tenido peores.

translation.en: Still, I'd like to propose a very temporary alliance.
All right. But when it's over, I walk.
translation.es: Vale, pero cuando se acabe, me largo.

translation.en: Not a chance, but I'll give you a head start.
translation.es: Ni hablar, pero te daré ventaja.

translation.en: You're losing your touch. I saw you a mile away.
translation.es: Estás perdiendo facultades. Te he visto a un kilómetro.

translation.en: Sure you did.
Good of you to join us, Tommy- san. And just in time.
translation.es: Gracias por venir, Tommy-san. Llegas justo a tiempo.

translation.en: I count 20 men.
- Heavy odds. - Yeah. For them.
Snake Eyes, betray our trust again, I'll kill you myself.
translation.es: Snake Eyes, si vuelves a traicionar nuestra confianza, te mataré yo misma.

translation.en: What is she doing here?
Let's just say our goals are temporarily aligned.
translation.es: Digamos que nuestros objetivos coinciden temporalmente.

translation.en: Just for tonight.
They're mine.
Yo, Joe.
Oh, fuck this.
You should have killed me when you had the chance.
translation.es: Debiste matarme cuando tuviste la oportunidad.

translation.en: - Tommy! -
Tommy- san, no! Tommy- san!
Kenta's gone.
Where's Snake?
- - Just stay down.
Abandon ego.
Practice selflessness.
Strike with honor.
This is where you die.
The Jewel of the Sun is secure.
translation.es: La Joya del Sol está a salvo.

translation.en: And it always will be.
At least for another generation.
I will be the last of our family to lead the Arashikage.
translation.es: Yo seré la última de nuestra familia que lidere a los Arashikage.

translation.en: But Sen- sama…
I had no choice.
I only used the Jewel to defend our people.
translation.es: Solo usé la joya para defender a nuestro pueblo.

translation.en: There is always a choice.
Our clan swore an oath to never use the Jewel,
translation.es: Nuestro clan juró que jamás usaría la joya,

translation.en: only to protect it.
You can never…
lead the clan.
- With respect-- - Remember your vows,
translation.es: Con el debido respeto… Recuerda tu juramento, Tommy,

translation.en: Tommy, to forever serve the clan in any capacity.
translation.es: de servir siempre al clan en cualquier condición.

translation.en: Serve?
Serve?
I have given my life to this clan!
translation.es: ¡Yo he entregado mi vida a este clan!

translation.en: - I have sacrificed everything! - Tommy.
It is my blood right!
You offered me your life.
Next time we meet…
translation.es: La próxima vez que nos veamos,

translation.en: …I will take it.
Tomisaburo, wait.
You will always be a part of this family.
translation.es: Siempre serás parte de esta familia.

translation.en: I serve no one.
- I'm going after Tommy. - I had a feeling you might.
translation.es: - Me voy a por Tommy. - Me lo imaginaba.

translation.en: Are you sure that's wise? In his state, who knows what he might do.
translation.es: ¿Seguro que haces bien? En ese estado, ¿quién sabe qué puede hacer?

translation.en: That's why I have to find him.
This is all my fault.
I have to do everything I can to make it right.
translation.es: Tengo que hacer todo lo posible por arreglarlo.

translation.en: Well, this might be useful.
Be careful.
Excuse me.
My commander, General Joe Colton, wanted to share this with you.
translation.es: Mi superior, el general Joe Colton, quiere que comparta esto contigo.

translation.en: I don't understand.
Your father was one of us. A Joe.
translation.es: Tú padre era de los nuestros, un Joe.

translation.en: He was a Joe?
You'll find no record of you in there. He kept you off the grid to protect you.
translation.es: No encontrarás una palabra sobre ti ahí. Te mantuvo escondido para protegerte.

translation.en: So, why was he killed?
Your father infiltrated a Cobra cell. But they found out.
translation.es: Tu padre se infiltró en una célula de Cobra, pero lo descubrieron.

translation.en: By the time we got there, he was dead and you were gone.
translation.es: Cuando llegamos, estaba muerto y tú te habías ido.

translation.en: But you should know the intel he provided saved thousands of lives.
translation.es: La información que nos proporcionó salvó miles de vidas.

translation.en: At the cost of his own.
It was a price he was willing to pay to make the world a safer place for the rest of us.
translation.es: Estaba dispuesto a pagar ese precio para que el mundo fuera más seguro,

translation.en: Safer for his son.
He left some big shoes to fill, your dad.
translation.es: Tu padre dejó un vacío muy grande.

translation.en: It hasn't been easy finding the right person to fill them.
translation.es: No ha sido fácil encontrar a la persona indicada para cubrirlo.

translation.en: So, you're saying I could be a Joe?
translation.es: ¿Insinúas que yo podría ser un Joe?

translation.en: Anything's possible.
We all make mistakes.
It's what we do next that really matters.
translation.es: Cómo los arreglamos es lo que de verdad importa.

translation.en: When you're ready, Akiko knows where to find us.
translation.es: Cuando estés preparado, Akiko sabe dónde encontrarnos.

translation.en: There's something I need to do first.
translation.es: Hay algo que debo hacer primero.

translation.en: Let's find Tommy and bring him home.
translation.es: Encontrar a Tommy y traerlo a casa.

translation.en: Something to drink before takeoff?
I'm not here to kill you.
I came to make you an offer.
You've lost an army, Tommy.
But I can get you a better one.
translation.es: Pero yo puedo conseguirte uno mejor.

translation.en: Storm Shadow.
Call me Storm Shadow.
